name: TOC
description:
Tones of Chaos is a game where you attempt to stop the demon Morta from taking over the world. This is achieved by entering the correct runes in the correct order. One you've completed the ritual, you summon an angelic being by the name of Ageora to defeat him.

Art/ Game Design:   Rodney Hussman   

Sound/3D Art:  Jesse Snyder
